00001 import wx, random
00002 import coga_panel as coga
00003 from iga.gacommon import gaParams
00004 from pickle import loads

00006 class RightPanel(wx.ScrolledWindow):
00007     def __init__(self, parent, params = None, size = None, color = "LIGHT BLUE", style = None):
00008         wx.ScrolledWindow.__init__(self, parent, -1, size=size, style = wx.DOUBLE_BORDER)
00009 
00010         self.parent = parent.GetParent()
00011 
00012         self.SetScrollbars(20,20,50,50)
00013 
00014         self.sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00015 
00016         self.startButton = wx.Button(self, -1, 'Start')
00017         self.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.onStart, self.startButton)
00018         self.sizer.Add(self.startButton)
00019 
00020         self.genLabel = wx.StaticText(self, -1, 'Generation 0')
00021         self.genLabel.Hide()
00022         self.sizer.Add(self.genLabel)
00023         self.sizer.Add((10, 10))
00024 
00025         # panels that display individuals from peers
00026         self.cogaPanel = coga.CollaboratePanel(self, name = "top")
00027 
00028         middleSpace = (50,10)
00029 
00030         # add top coga panel
00031         middleSizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.HORIZONTAL)
00032 
00033         import display_panel
00034         self.displayPanel = display_panel.DisplayPanel(self)
00035         self.displayPanel.Hide()
00036         middleSizer.Add(self.displayPanel, 0, wx.EXPAND)
00037 
00038         middleSizer.AddSpacer(middleSpace)
00039         middleSizer.Add(self.cogaPanel, 0, wx.EXPAND)
00040 
00041         self.sizer.Add(middleSizer)
00042 
00043         # Add submit button
00044         step = gaParams.getVar('stepSize') or 1
00045         self.submit = wx.Button(self, -1, 'Step %d Gen' % step, size = (130,-1))
00046         self.submit.Enable(False)
00047         self.submit.Hide()
00048         self.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.onSubmit, self.submit)
00049 
00050         self.sizer.Add((150, 10), 0)
00051         self.sizer.Add(self.submit, 0)
00052         self.SetSizer(self.sizer)
00053 
00054         self.Layout()
00055 
00056         self.generation = 1

00059 #-------------------------------------------#
00060     def onSubmit(self, e):
00061         '''
00062         Take user selection and pass it to the GA for 
00063         fitness evaluation.
00064         '''
00065         # get user input
00066         feedback = self.displayPanel.getUserInput()
00067         if feedback:
00068             # check to see if any genomes need to be added to gene pool
00069             inject_genomes = self.cogaPanel.getPeerGenomes()
00070             print 'inject_genomes ', inject_genomes
00071 
00072             panels_to_display = gaParams.step(feedback, self.displayPanel, inject_genomes)
00073             self.display(panels_to_display)
00074 
00075             self.generation += gaParams.getVar('stepSize')
00076             self.genLabel.SetLabel('Generation %d' % self.generation)
00077 
00078     
00079 #-------------------------------------------#
00080     def onRun(self):
00081         self.startButton.Hide()
00082         self.submit.Enable(True)
00083         self.submit.Show()
00084         self.currentGen = 0
00085         self.genLabel.SetLabel('Generation 1')
00086         self.displayPanel.Show()
00087 
00088 #-------------------------------------------#
00089     def setGeneration(self, gen):
00090         self.genLabel.SetLabel('Generation %d' % gen)
00091         self.generation = gen
00092 
00093 #-------------------------------------------#
00094     def fit(self):
00095         self.parent.Layout()
00096 
00097 #-------------------------------------------#
00098     def display(self, panels_to_display):
00099         '''
00100         Takes a list of panels to display to be evaluated.
00101         '''
00102         displayPanel = self.displayPanel
00103         displayPanel.clear()
00104 
00105         expandFlag = bool(gaParams.getVar('expand'))
00106         displayPanel.addPanels(panels_to_display, expand=expandFlag)
00107         displayPanel.fit()
00108 
00109         self.fillCoGAPanels()
00110 
00111         self.Layout()
00112 
00113 #-------------------------------------------#
00114     def fillCoGAPanels(self):
00115         '''
00116         Request genomes from peers to be displayed on collaboration
00117         panels.
00118         '''
00119         peer_list = gaParams.peer_list
00120         peer_num = min(4, len(peer_list))
00121         panel_counter = 0
00122         row_size = gaParams.getVar('rowSize')
00123         peer_genome = []
00124         # for every peer, ping it, if alive then
00125         # get pickled genomes and draw them in the coga panels
00126 
00127         to_draw = []
00128         status = []
00129         for peer in peer_list:
00130             if peer.online():
00131                 genome = peer.proxy.getGenomes()
00132                 genome_objs = loads(genome)
00133                 peer_genome.append(genome_objs)
00134                 to_display = row_size
00135                 to_draw.extend(genome_objs)
00136                 panel_counter += 1
00137                 status.append([peer.getName(), 'online'])
00138             else:
00139                 status.append([peer.getName(), 'offline'])
00140 
00141         self.parent.peerStatus(status)
00142 
00143         if to_draw:
00144             self.cogaPanel.drawGenomes(random.sample(to_draw, 9))
00145 
00146         self.peer_genome = peer_genome
00147 
00148 #-------------------------------------------#
00149     def onStart(self, event):
00150         self.parent.onRun(event)
00151 
00152 #-------------------------------------------#
00153     def setStepSize(self, step):
00154         self.submit.SetLabel('Step %d Gen' % step)
